description:
This is a romance game for women where you can enjoy romance with hot butlers. The route characters are top-class celebrities who serve as your personal butlers -- sometimes sweet, sometimes aggressive.

Available in Japanese, English, and Simplified Chinese.

The Story
When your aunt asks you to work part-time for her talent agency, you didn't expect to be asked to live in her mansion for three months! Living together with you as butlers are an actor, an idol, or a model â€” all super-famous. But, each one comes with his own problems...
name: My Butler
intro: The otome game of your dreams where you can enjoy a budding romance with haughty idols-turned-butlers!
